Pre-Game Insights: Iran is a favorite to win the match and advance to the knockout stages of the Asian Cup
Hong Kong showed potential in their opening match despite losing to the United Arab Emirates
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at the Khalifa International Stadium in Al Rayyan, Qatar
Others: The match will kick off at 12:30 pm ET on Friday, January 19, 2024
The game can be watched and streamed online live through Paramount+ in the US
